# componentsPerVector

**Instance Property**

The number of scalar components in each vector.

## Declaration

```swift
var componentsPerVector: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

In the case that [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeometrySource/componentsPerVector] is greater than 1, the element type of the geometry-source array is itself, a sequence.

## Getting Geometry Information

- **count**: The number of vectors in the buffer.
- **format**: The type of vector data in the buffer.
- **offset**: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the buffer.
- **stride**: The length, in bytes, of the start of one vector in the buffer to the start of the next vector.
